Title: Wont install Framework ect automaticly ???
Description:
I have an app/program (an EXE-file) I made way back when King of Spade was a Knight and I've used it for years on Windows 10 where it automaticly downloaded and installed the dependencies !

Now I run it under Windows 11 ... it just DON'T !

I know I SHOULD go back and make an "install package" but isn't there a 'Work-Around' ?
Author: keldsor
EnhancedContent:
I have an app/program (an EXE-file) I made way back when King of Spade was a Knight and I've used it for years on Windows 10 where it automaticly downloaded and installed the dependencies !

Now I run it under Windows 11 ... it just DON'T !

I know I SHOULD go back and make an "install package" but isn't there a 'Work-Around' ?
